argument.name: source_url
argument.description: The URL of the page to download.

argument.name: target_file
argument.description: The path and name of the file to create.

page.description: Creates a background thread which uses the HTTP protocol to download from source_url and save the data to target_file
page.discussion: The HTTP_DOWNLOAD_BG() function creates a background thread which uses the HTTP protocol to download from Source_URL and save the data to Target_File. Note : When the server responds with a 302 code, HTTP_DOWNLOAD_BG() does not automatically use the new URL. The developer needs to examine result.parsed_headers.status_code, then if appropriate, try the URL provided in result.parsed_headers.location. Refer to HTTP_GET()for an example.
